name: GENERATIVE PERSIAN MAZANDARAN kelim (RARE EDITION)
description:
Generative artwork exploring color and the emergent effect of stacking simple shapes and filling their intersections. Which takes you on the journey to an imaginary universe. All paintings are created using custom algorithms in processing.
This collection has an abstract look at Iranian carpets, art-industrial carpets that have long overshadowed Iranian culture as a name and credit for Iran.
This handwoven Kilim Fars combines Persian patterns with the old tradition of flat fabrics. It represents a beautiful composition of contemporary Persian elements and a modern style due to its geometric patterns and warm colors.
